Text: Wow! I've been waiting for this! Thanks a bunch :)
Got another request...could you do LETTERS TO JULIET please? Just curious to watch the movie as I've heard about the visuals being great. TIA!
Thank you Anoxmous! This is a great choice - one of the best movies from 2012. All actors are great and it's a wonderful story.
Playback stops shortly after 1 hour on Samsung LED TV's....Might be a protection issue.  Works fine on PC players though....
Download at your own risk. Notice of Action under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act has been sent to certain people when their IPs have been viewed downloading this torrent.
